name: codecompanion-history.nvim (ravitemer)
description: [项目级] A history management extension for codecompanion AI chat plugin that enables saving, browsing and restoring chat sessions.。来源: https://github.com/ravitemer/codecompanion-history.nvim

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A history management extension for codecompanion AI chat plugin that enables saving, browsing and restoring chat sessions.

来源: https://github.com/ravitemer/codecompanion-history.nvim
语言: Lua
Stars: 165
